title: Peter Patter Book of Nursery Rhymes
description: This is a Nursery Rhyme Book with lots of delightful short, rhyming stories that are meant to be read aloud to small children. They are vintage rhymes, most from the 1800s.   Each section has about 5 minutes of rhymes.
